author: raulj
content: Hi Jin! I see you discovered our prototype branch. We are indeed trying out elements 1 and 2 for now, and are just working on this in our free time as there are other high priorities we need to ship at Prysm. However, I am happy to answer any questions about building light clients in Golang and/or integrating with Prysm ðŸ™‚

author: jinfwhuang
content: Thanks, Raul. I will reach out to ask you questions and also get your comments on how we should pursue the light client effort within the prysm codebase.
